EclipseFinderOutputInfo¶

class orbitpy.eclipsefinder.EclipseFinderOutputInfo(spacecraftId=None, stateCartFile=None, eclipseFile=None, outType=None, startDate=None, duration=None, _id=None)[source]¶
Class to hold information about the results of the eclipse-finder. An object of this class is returned upon the execution

of the eclipse finder.

Variables

  • spacecraftId (str or int) – Spacecraft identifier.

  • stateCartFile (str) – File (filename with path) where the spacecraft time-series state data is saved.

  • eclipseFile (str) – File (filename with path) where the eclipse data are saved.

  • startDate (float) – Time start for eclipse-finder calculations in Julian Date UT1.

  • duration (float) – Time duration in days for which the eclipse-finder calculations were carried out.

  • _id (str or int) – Unique identifier.

Parameters

out_type (orbitpy.eclipsefinder.EclipseFinder.OutType) – Indicates the type of output data to be saved.
